member.name: T:FluentUI.Blazor.Community.ByteSize
member.summary: Provides binary (IEC) unit constants, properties, and methods for the struct.
Represents a size in bytes and provides methods for formatting, conversion, and comparison.
Provides operator overloads and comparison logic for the struct.
Provides decimal (SI) unit constants, properties, and methods for the struct.

member.summary: The number of bytes in one gibibyte (GiB). 1 GiB = 1,024 MiB = 1,073,741,824 bytes.

member.summary: The number of bytes in one tebibyte (TiB). 1 TiB = 1,024 GiB = 1,099,511,627,776 bytes.

member.name: F:FluentUI.Blazor.Community.ByteSize.BytesInPebiByte
member.summary: The number of bytes in one pebibyte (PiB). 1 PiB = 1,024 TiB = 1,125,899,906,842,624 bytes.

member.summary: The number of bytes in one exbibyte (EiB). 1 EiB = 1,024 PiB = 1,152,921,504,606,846,976 bytes.
